revision.text: '''Eggs''' are items that contain Pokemons. Eggs can be obtained in 2 ways : Hatch a shop egg or a level 100 Pokemon. == Shop Egg Pool == '''<big>Kanto</big>''' {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Fire !! Grass !! Water !! Electric !! Fighting !! Dragon |- | Charmander || Bulbasaur || Squirtle || Magnemite || Hitmonchan || Dratini |- | Growlithe || Oddish || Lapras || Pikachu || Hitmonlee || Dragonair |- | Ponyta || Bellsprout || Staryu || Voltorb || Machop || Dragonite |- | Vulpix || Tangela || Psyduck || Electabuzz || Mankey || |}
